PHRASE.LANG: Sweat à capuche Lil' Bastard - Bleu
Boss. Nemesis. Dark Lord of the Underworld. No wonder his parents named him Lil’ Bastard. Yeah, we checked his birth certificate, he does have parents. [#Legal]
Boss. Nemesis. Dark Lord of the Underworld. Pas étonnant que ses parents l'aient appelé Lil’ Bastard. Ouais, on a vérifié son certificat de naissance, il a bien des parents. [#Legal]
